stories.title: Chess robot breaks finger of 7-year-old opponent
We test an electric Mercedes that can can go 747 miles on a single charge
How to source passive software engineering talent
Craft Coffee Is Everywhere, Research Explains How We Got There

stories.text:
I couldn't help but notice that many young people don't want to spend months pulling their hair off to get a deeper understanding of what they do... they want to obtain value very quickly.

Paul Graham once tweeted that he was explaining to his son that he can't be Einstein and Messi, and his son said so I will be Messi. But no Messi if there is no Stadium, Stream, Cameras, etc...

The existence of a big number of people who can do complicated jobs is crucial for the modern world, and I think this whole thing will fall down if it continued with the current mode.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is the world suffering from shallow knowledge?
An alternative interpretation of the psychotherapeutic use of psychedelics

stories.text:
I wonder how many folks here are using voice assistance or issue commands through their mobile or Desktop "AI" like Siri or Google Voice?

If so, for what purpose?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you using voice commands via Siri or Google Voice?
